title: Kenny Wayne Shepherd/ Trouble Is...
description:
Trouble Is ... is the second album by the blues solo artist Kenny Wayne Shepherd. It features the #1 Mainstream Rock Tracks hit "Blue on Black". The album also spawned three further hits including "Slow Ride", "Somehow, Somewhere, Someway" and "Everything is Broken", a Bob Dylan cover. Trouble Is ... was certified Gold by the RIAA in 1998, and later certified Platinum by the RIAA in 1999.

  10. "Nothing To Do With Love" (Williams/Miller) ? 4:49

  12. "Trouble Is ..." (Shepherd/Layton/Shannon/Wynans) ? 3:57
